channel.title: How to change background for your client please help!
channel.description:
um i kinda new with this and i would appreciate it if you did not put bad comments,
ok i need to put a new background for a client that i found and a new name at the top aswell, in addition i have never coded in my life and what i hear from people its not easy so can you please help me?

item.title: How to change background for your client please help!
item.dc:creator: @dots dots
item.description:
@dots wrote:

ok depending on the client, there should be a folder called “sprites or spirts” open that up and look for the picture that it shows when you load up the client. find the pic, right click and click edit. make your changes then file then save.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change background for your client please help!
item.dc:creator: @pk_fubway pk fubway
item.description:
@pk_fubway wrote:

kk tryed it and it worked follow my step exactly[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 09:35:59 am[/size][hr]1.open the picture that you have already that is on background
2.right click it then click edit
3.open the picture u want to be the client background
4.right click then edit
5.the 1 u want click edit at the top then select all
6.right click picture then copy
7.go on to current background
8.then click edit at top bar then paste then
9.your image you want will appear make it big enogth so it fit hole paint
10.compile
11.then run.

good luck tryed it and it works.

Read full topic
